title: Can't find the high-dose flu vaccine? Here's why
author: Jayne Chacko
description: ROCHESTER, N. Y - The high-dose flu shot recommended for senior citizens 65 and older is hard to find these days at big chain pharmacies like CVS and Walgreens. 13WHAM called several locations in the area and were told the high-dose flu vaccine is either out of stock or supply is very limited. Some Wegmans Pharmacies are seeing delays in shipments of the high-dose flu vaccine.
